name: Deadline of the Dead
storyline:
If you want to keep your job, you’ll have to stay behind and pull some serious overtime! That's a sacrifice you're willing to make for a steady paycheck, right? Balance work, coffee, bathroom breaks, and not being eaten by zombies, in this corporate action shooter. Your goal is to finish all 20 jobs (blue).

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43. It ranked 11th overall and 4th in fun out of 1750 entries. You can play with mouse and keyboard, but we recommend using a gamepad.
summary: Balance work and not being eaten by zombies
